title: Perfect Hide and Seek Map!
body:
The new game mode coming out would be perfect for hide and seek. Half the map is gone, the offence team cant back, and the teams would even switch for you! Fun gadgets like the infinite flash area you could use to run away too.

Anybody else think this would be a good idea?

replies.body:
NO. When Hide in seek died it paved the way for the only true custom game mode to come back
**WARDBALL**
In order to ensure it's continued dominance I will eradicate all custom competition. You better watch your back kid.
https://s32.postimg.org/5pynrkkdx/Getsniped.png
think it would be like a chick slumber party with lots of giggling but no lesbo action
